nodes.bodyText: it is the same then earlier. Much better if you check _DELETED_@_timestamp is in the name or not.

why is this the same?
we dont modify the env name until we can not delete

if you see the desc in the jira: gtlocal1_DELETED_@1601902245809_DELETED@1601903025413_DELETED@1601903612895_DELETED@1601904217274_DELETED@1601904607194_DELETED@1601905595570_DELETED@1601906596339_DELETED@1601906833696_DELETED@1601907190970_DELETED@1601908948322_DELETED@_1601923539012
of course, this is a timeline error but I could delete only in debug mode (I updated first with less than 255 chars and save it)
